node.title: Cleo Smith's parents say the four-year-old suffers from nightmares
node.alt: A crying woman holds a photo of a child.
node.description: The parents of Cleo Smith tell 60 Minutes their four-year-old girl has suffered from nightmares in the aftermath of her abduction last October.
node.content:
["The parents of Cleo Smith say their four-year-old girl has suffered from nightmares in the aftermath of her abduction.", "Ellie Smith and Jake Gliddon described the ordeal in an interview on Nine's 60 Minutes, detailing the night Cleo was snatched from their family tent on October 16 and the months that have followed.", "\"Every day and night is different. But she's OK. She's, happy, she's bubbly,\" Ms Smith said.", "\"She's sad, she's angry. But she's getting there.\"", "Cleo\u00a0was taken from her family tent at the Quobba Blowholes campsite, north-east of Carnarvon, while they slept.", "A massive land, air and sea search was launched, but there was no trace of the little girl, or the sleeping bag she was in when her parents put her to bed for 18 days.", "", "
Cleo Smith in hospital after being found safe and well in November last year.(Twitter: @WA_Police\u00a0)
", "She was eventually found in a home at Carnarvon, several kilometres from her family home.", "Ms Smith explained the relief she felt having her daughter back, but she noticed that her daughter had changed.", "\"[It was] 7:00am in the morning after we got her back, and she was jumping around, you know, dancing, singing. She was just so happy.", "\"And that was such a beautiful moment, just to see her as the old Cleo, there was, like, for us, you know.", "\"We've seen her do it a million times before, and now a million after, and it's still different.", "", "
Cleo Smith was kidnapped from the tent she slept in with her parents in October 2021.(Facebook: Ellie Smith)
", "Ms Smith said the family are now focusing on the healing process. She said move away from Carnarvon."]
